values:
Your Birthdate: November 10
Independent and dominant, you tend to be the alpha dog in most situations. You're very confident, and hardly anything ever shakes you. Mundane tasks tend to drain you - you prefer to be making great plans. You are quite original. When people don't "get" you, it bothers you a lot. Your strength: Your ability to gain respect Your weakness: Caring too much what others think Your power color: Orange-red Your power symbol: Letter X Your power month: October
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

so this song made me weep a great deal. of sadness and was greatly jealous that i myself didn't write it. Complete and total adoration, My gift to you, my heart was yours, In ten weeks you shaped it, In one night you murdered it. Torn from my chest and laid at your feet, That first step that you took was the worst. Since then you've walked a thousand miles in solace and short remark, And I still have these memories, But will never see what we could have been. Remember when we talked about where we'd be a year from now? Remember when you held my hand like you'd never let it go? Remember, cause that's all you can do. We'll never make another memory, We'll never make another memory. I wish I would have died in your arms the last time we were together, So I wouldn't have to wake without you today. This time I thought things were real, You said they were, What happened? You were a priority, Was I an option? I let you see a side of me that I don't share with anyone. Promises are just words unless they are fulfilled. Knew from the beginning all I had to offer you was my heart, I'm just sorry that it wasn't enough. So, we'll go our own ways, And hopefully you'll remember these things I've told you, Hopefully you'll understand that everything I said is in sincerity. A broken heart is not what I wanted from this, But I guess I've learned from it. But aren't you supposed to learn from your mistakes? I don't consider this a mistake, I just wish the story didn't end this way, Cause I'm still in love with the person who helped me write it. Remember when you held my hand like you'd never let it go? Remember when we talked about where we'd be a year from now? across five aprils. [a godlike band]
i learn new things every day. its fan-fucking-tastic really :-D

what an awesome day to stay home sick. its purely disgraceful outside. i slept til almost one because hey what else have i got to do? i feel like crap. i can't breathe and surely my voice will leave me shortly but im holding onto it as long as possible. i kind of wish i went to school today cuz we had a review day is stat and well stat= hell so i need all the help i can get, although i don't really care if i pass anymore. but if i had gone i wouldnt have listened cuz well i never do. no matter how hard i try to make myself. i had to eat little kid cereal this morning cuz i finished off my box so i ate sugar for breakfast. it was very disgusting. like this stupid song im listening to. it sucks terribly. thats what ive been doing all day. looking up music because im tired of all mine. but i cant find anything decent whatsoever. well i think im going to go take a bath, see if the hot water slash steam will unstuff my nose and then go back to bed.
YOU are fucking fake and i dont buy ANY of it.

had a girls night out saturday. what a blast! laser tag and go carts oh and pony riding. yee haw lol i had a fabulous time. havent hung out with my girls in a LONG time, at least not all three of us together anyways. Got home, everything went downhill from there. came home to screaming child and had to rock him to sleep for over an hour then i got in trouble for not calling the boyfriend and then got in trouble by my mom for talking to him. i just could NOT get it right i guess. then the beginning of yesterday sucked as well and today i woke up late. woo what a blast. school time. laters.

woo the flight home was.....bumpy and i thought i was going to die about 6 different times i kept grabbing onto the middle armrest and the guy next to me would look over and laugh and tell me we'd be fine. everytime too...and i did this about 20 times lol it was NOT a fun ride. AND ooohhhh i was mad! my mom was late, i had to sit ON THE FLOOR in the backseat cuz she had a huge box in the back that she didnt want to get out of the car cuz it was RAINING booo whhooooo so i had to sit in the back cuz matt wouldnt have been able to fit although it would have been funny to see him try haha and then!!!! ::fumes:: i asked my mom to take me to starbucks to make it all up to me and she said okay but as soon as we got to our exit she decided she didnt "feel like it" so yeah we went to my house wet, cold and without coffee....grr oh well i had a good day slash evening anyways. even though someone is a bit of a hypocrite...shh dont tell him. he doesn't read this lol later kiddos, hope your break was swell.

How does it feel to know you're everything I need 
The butterflies in my stomach 
they could bring me to my knees 
How does it feel to know you're everything I want 
I've got a hard time saying this 
so I'll sing it in a song 

Oh I adore the way you carry yourself 
With the grace of a thousand angels overhead 
I love the way the galaxy starts to melt 
When we become one 
When we become one 
When we become one 
When we become one 

How does it feel 
How does it feel when we get locked into a stare? 
Please don't come looking for me 
when I get lost in the mess of your hair 
How do you feel when everything you've known 
gets thrown aside 
Never fear, my dear, 'cause we have nothing left to hide 

Oh I adore the way you carry yourself 
With the grace of a thousand angels overhead 
I love the way the galaxy starts to melt 

Hold on to me girl 
If you feel your grip getting loose 
just know that I'm right next to you 
Hold on to me girl 
If you feel your grip getting loose 
Just know that I won't let you down 

Well, I'm ready 
Well, I'm ready 
I am ready 
To run away with you 
Are you ready? 
Are you ready? 
Are you ready? 
To run away with me 

Pack your things we can leave today 
Pack your things we can leave today 
Say our goodbyes and get on the train 
Say goodbye 
Just you and I in the sweet unknown 
We can just call each other our home 

If I had to choose a way to die 
it'd be with you 
In a goosebump infested embrace 
With my overanxious hands cupping your face 
In a goosebump infested embrace 
With my overanxious hands cupping your cherub face 

How does it feel?

well, its been awhile..went to the thursday show which was on a monday.. har har it took me a really long time to get that..if i even do now..? i dunno anyways took pictures but my computer conveniently decided it didnt want to recognize my camera any longer. grr! BUT never fear! kara fixed it! ::bright lights and music:: it was a very awesome show. i had to suffer thru stretch though. not a big fan but they played a cover of modern english- melt with you so it was all good. but thursday was amazing. they just have so much energy and your RIGHT THERE like 2 feet away from everyone on stage it bleeds through the air to everyone and everyone is just having an awesome time :-D love it! plus they played jet black and paris in flames..orgasm. haha anyways gota go. im slave for the day. argh the guy with the star saved me from the mosh pit..what a hero ::bats eyes:: ha ha I love this picture <3 head automatica aka daryl from glassjaw these guys were awesome. and this guy was drinking wine from the bottle while playing.quite talented i do say ;-) (i hate how this picture turned out! grr..) these guys put on an awesome show. if they come back around, go see them, trust me!

i just read one of my friends friends ljs and gosh i dunno whats wrong with me i mean dont get me wrong i love when people are happy and they're all i love you and blah blah but this person was getting to the point where my stomach hurts with the i love you baby blah blahs.. ugh its seriously making me sick to my stomach and i wish it didnt cuz i feel bad like i dont want them to be happy or something and i do...who knows. im weird...im a girl..i'm entitled to my moodiness

i finally saw spiderman last night. it was quite good i do say but the crazy guy with the arm...things...i did NOT like him...at all...doc ock? or some shit..who knows.. lol (jessica dont kill me for not knowing lol) anyways yeah it was good now all i have to do is wait 2 more years for the 3rd one to come out...jeez. saw a preview for that new tom cruise movie..looks like awinner..minus the fact that he has grey hair (wtf is goin on with that) OH OH and BLADE THREE jordan had an orgasm when the preview came up. quite hilarious. trust me. ha ha hmm what else is coming out..ohh ohh that new josh hartnett movie..i dont even know the name, ive never seen a preview and i have no idea what its about but frankly..i dont give a damn ha ha its josh hartnett..come no seriously who cares what its about. (do you like stickers? we can talk about stickers! you stupid stupid sillylittleperson!!! if your name is jessica you'll know what im talking about ;) anyways hmmm ohhh bourne supremecy jeez yes awesome. can't wait. i think i saw bourne identity like 10 times. &if you are one of the privledged ones to have the dvd you must agree with me that the alternate ending owns the real one...by far. anyways if you have NOT seen it. give it a go its fucking awesome. trust me. well i guess thats enough movie spasms for today

this weekend consisted of...
-losing my voice
-getting made fun of for losing it
-watching dirty dancing with a boy whom i like very much. it was nice, that movie is one of my favorites.
-eating a fantastic dinner at yamatos 
-sitting on the deck at 11pm eating jolly ranchers with joe discussing our book that we will write.. "the things that piss us off"...its quite a long book ;)
-realizing that dane cook is freaking hilarious
-tearing ugly wallpaper off the kitchen walls..that is THE most un-fun task ever. 
-getting in trouble for saying fuck (how gay)
-wacthing i love the 90s even though ive seen it like 20587 times. im addicted.
-talking to a friend who scared me into realization that im not too many years away from going through what he is.
-getting an invite to go out on the lake but turning it down cuz i feel like crap :( 
..my life is quite un-interesting when im sick it seems
OHH! the boy came back. the one that knocked on the door. he's selling some kinda lazyman's handbook for school or something. who knows. my mom bought some SAT software. i do not like him, he kept asking me to tell him what he thought of this or that. so now my throat hurts really bad and joe being the good pharmacy student that he is is making me some weird thing im supposed to gargle with..his analogy was "its like ambosol for your throat" so i was like bring it on. i guess we'll see.. lol

well...im not quite sure what just happened but i think i got hit on by this guy who came and knocked on my door. (*sings*:come and knock on our dooorrr: threes company theme song..if you dont know it your lame!) ahum anyways! this guy rang the doorbell and at first i thought it was one of those sister mary catherine people so i wasnt going to answer it cuz i didnt want to deal with the do you love god do you want to become a mormon mumbo jumbo.. (sry jess...that religion is insanely boring..and weird lol) anyways but he was standing out there for like 5 minutes and its INSANELY hot so i felt bad and opened the door ready to put on my distressed sickly face if the jesus talk was starting. but he was just all like hey hows it goin and i was like ummm fine..*confused face* evidently he is trying to sell his services lol his "services" ha ha no but really i think he's a tutor or something like that im not quite sure..he's supposed to come back tomorrow and hopefully i'll find out what he's selling then..maybe he's selling sexual services who the hell knows i think i had a 15 min conversation with the kid and i still dont. it was odd. he seemed nice/sincere enough to be for real but then again so do some rapists...so after he left i ran and told joe..of course joe being..well JOE laughed and then was like that wasnt smart be careful. yet this was the same guy who last night was like whenever your in college come to our frat parties! lol he cracks me up. anyways. the odd non-mormon fellow is gone. he tried to pull the whole are you still in high school? "yes" well you must be a senior this year right? "no, sophmore" ohh....really? *shocked face* i hate when people do that. i guess we'll see what happens...:-/ later kiddos

suprisingly i feel quite a bit better today it doesn't feel like razorblades in my throat. which is always good i would assume lol still not 100% but i'm getting there...finally. but now it seems that my stepdad is sick so i'm just waiting for it to come back around. i think im gonna have mono for like the rest of my life. lol not good. but i found out i get to go to see thursday which doesnt suck at all. but it seems i'm being kicked off eric is looking for a job i think i'm about to have three parental units working for the usps. insanity.
later

woke up this morning sweating and not being able to breath without it feeling like there's knives in my throat. took my temperature..98.1 nobody knows what i have, it could be rosolia or something like that that my brother just had and i caught it or it could be just a cold but because of the fucking mono its making me feel like i'm gonna die. i better get over this fast cuz im going to the damn show tomorrow....if i can find a way to get around the madre knowing. but as of right now i'm going back to sleep or something cuz i feel like shit. it sucks i hate being sick

got woken up by my cell phones magical ring...no big suprise but it was all good cuz i got to go with kell to see katie at the airport, her parents didnt look so excited we were there but her parents are related to satan so i was expecting much. so anyways got to go to the confusing airport, almost crashed into a mondo expensive escalade, ran up the down escalator WARNING: its much harder than it seems. and had eye sex with the guy driving next to us on the way home on the interstate. HILARIOUS. quite entertaining if i do say so myself. i suprise myself sometimes.. which is good cuz living with yourself everyday gets kinda....boring...but oh well i think i'm stuck with me. my mom is being super nice to me and things are going pretty well which is awesome, guess all we had to do was bitch each other out..hmm quite odd..she's letting me paint my room BRIGHT ASS PINK and get a new bedspread to match WOO im excited! i think i'm gonna start taking drivers ed soon so i can get my effing liscense but that will require major motivation on the madres part...aka driving me all the way to the dmv dear lord its 5 mins away. but no complaints we're being civil for once and shes finally backing off of me a little..apparently yelling "i wish you would leave me the fuck alone once and awhile" unfortunately works. well gonna go, lunch is calling
KELLEY-your hair is insane. and so is your truck.
it used to make me sad but now i just think your being really fucking selfish

it kind of makes me sad that someone i used to call my best friend now couldnt care less about me it seems, someone i used to share lunch with everyday, someone who used to pull out the purple skittles to give to me even though skittles were his god, he'd share them anyways. someone who used to stay up all night to talk to me online when i was at my dads even though it was through emails and was quite inconvenient & took forever. someone who hates all my music but when jessica simpson comes on he knows all the words, someone i'd make cake for and bring it to lunch and youd eat the whole thing, lick the container clean and never fail to crack me up at the sight. someone who exposed me to the awesomeness that is fight club and quoted monty python with me 1034674 times, someone who no matter how much i thought i had you pinned you always managed to suprise me in some odd way or another. i miss all these times.. it seems he's gotten side tracked and i am soo happy for him&her for that because i love them both alot and they have both been through far too much crap for how awesome people they are and they deserve to be happy and im so glad that they are. that really makes me smile. i just wished i meant as much to him as he does to me, who knows maybe he does...or maybe not who knows.. it just makes me mad that it matters to me and when i bring it up he doesnt take me seriously or just says "ok" so i guess im done bothering with it.
Jessica- I was really looking forward to coming up there to see you cuz the past couple times i wasnt even informed you were here til you were gone again so i haven't seen you in forever. plus carowinds is fun and i was actually gonna be brave and go on top gun ;-) i was really excited for the four of us to be able to all hang out again cuz that hasn't happened in a really long time and the times when we're all together makes me genuinely happy. But, turns out its not working out that way which really sucks but you and jeremy have a blast and tell me all about it. i'll try to get my mom to bring me up for a weekend trip or something but i dunno my mom finally decided that its time to fix up the house on the weekends..so we'll see. i'm sad you're not moving back but at the same time i'm happy cuz i know you are miserable here when you're at your house, which is quite understandable, i hope everything works out for you with everything. i love you. &don't worry i know you love me too, cuz no one else would put up with all the shit that i do. lol

update: had a long yelling conversation w/ my mom on the phone and realized that everything about our fucked up relationship is my fault and she has no idea why i think she's "so horrible" and blah blah bullshit so basically at the end of the conversation she said that if im not going to be more compassionate and understanding of her feelings she wants me out. so everybody throw me a going away party cuz i've just been kicked out of my house.

...also, my brother caught mono from me and is being put in the hospital. i feel wonderful today.

i think im gonna be sick

I'm coming home tomorrow if it fucking kills me.
today suprisingly was alright :gasp: i went to the mall and finally got a new pair of jeans. lol definitily needed. and new converse. i almost forgot about that. how sad. but yeah anyways it was alright, i think everything is finally working out for me coming home but im not gonna be too sure yet cuz theres always one person left to decide i can't go...fucking bastards.. i get to go look for more pants later...woo i love spending money when its not mine lol on a different note...im really tired of the way i look. i dunno, like lately everyones been happy with themselves and i love that so much because none of my friends realize how beautiful they are and they finally are, i guess im just tired of looking at the same ol me day after day, i think im gonna dye my hair dark. i dunno, im tired of blonde its so....annoying. we'll see i guess, and if i can get over being so damn lazy im gonna start straightening my hair cuz the curls...pissing me off. lol but im not going to continue to rant about how i think im boring or whatnot. cuz i dont want to throw myself i pity party..i hate those. im out. ps i just wanted to say THANK YOU SO MUCH to everyone thats been helping me lately deal with all of this, without you i'd be emotionally insane right now, or in a hospital...dear lord.

well, i had everything worked out up until atlanta. then i was a) stuck b) being picked up by kelley or c) staying with joe. so as long as i could get b or c worked out id be all set to go. but as it turns out, i got BOTH of those set up and my gma decided she doesnt want to leave. theyre planning a plane for me on the 12th or something and i told them that all i wanted was to be back by the 4th to go to kelleys toga party. that was the ONLY thing i asked for, not attention, not money, not anything taking time out of their day. but apparently getting a flight for the 4th or earlier would, cause them to give me attention because they would realize i was leaving soon, would cause them to spend money on me because its such short notice and would take time out of their days becuz theyd have to take time off work (jesus christ lets all die cant let that happen). so to keep anyone from being inconvenienced im just staying here. my dads happy that im here indefinitely and my moms happy im not there. until she realizes how fucking much i do for her besides piss her off and make mistakes that she has to "guard" me from everything thats going to happen to me no matter what she tries to do. but whatever im fucking tired of everything that has to do with her, maybe its good im here, i can stop caring...indefinitely. my dads happy, my moms happy, thats all that matters. i guess i'll stay put then, to once again please everyone but myself. god i wish i fucking meant anything i said anymore. i cant even lie to myself.

i saw one tiny spark of hope yesterday when my mom said it was okay that i went home with kelley. i never thought she'd say yes, i wasnt even gonna ask, but i did and to my suprise she said yes. i felt relief like with that simple 'yes' things were going to start getting better because one thing finally had so why couldnt the rest? apparently someone out there is trying really hard to see to it that everytime i get a glimmer of hope they give me enough time to sew it to my skin to make sure it doesnt leave me and then rips it away inch by inch. until i'm left gaping and bloody with only the hope that my scars wont sting me. im so tired of all of this, everything keeps falling on me and i cant fix it no matter how hard i try so i run, but i cant run fast enough to escape my own shadow it's always there waiting to break me down again with that evil smile of pleasure it gets from all of my pain. i really don't know what else there is to do, i can't just break down thats not something that i do, im the strong one, i pick everyone else up. i dont know how to pick up myself. but last night i once again was reassured that i have true friends who would do anything for me. i feel so much like i dont deserve it and i have no idea why they think i do. but i guess they see something thats worth loving in me and maybe one day i'll see it too.

my mom fucked me over once again...imagine turns out she doesn't know when she can come get me. see when i left she made it sound all peachy that i was gonna come back up b/w the 30th of june and like the 2nd of july and she would have no prob. coming to get me from georgia, well apparently they have to do their 6 month thing at work and its like mega important...they do this every six months so wouldnt she have know ahead of time...hmm june is the 6th month were gonna have to do the blah blah bullshit after they did it in december? i dunno maybe i give her too much credit for being the FUCKING BOSS. cuz you know bosses know whats going on in their company. no? hmm guess i dont know how the "real world" jobs work. oh well guess im stuck here and im fucking pissed off damnit. grr.. lol oh well my computer is gay and i finally got my cord but it wont let me load my pictures guess i'll have to wait til never when i get back to sc. someone fucking rescue me! now!

okay i havent updated in a longass time but its cuz this gay computer wont let me use rich text and i dont know html so i just haven't----anyways----today i woke up and walked out to the kitchen but in the process i looked out the full length window and saw that there were fucking mexicans in my backyard. i was scared like foreal. so i ran past the windows hoping they wouldnt see me and called my dad...he had no idea why they were there either so i was like uhh wtf is going on....make a long story short, all these houses in here are connected like one side of our fence is the side of our neighbors house& apparently they hired the god awful mexicans to pressure wash there house and never told me. fuckers. i thought i was gonna get raped good god. lol anyways someone tell me how to use html so i can press enter b/w paragraphs to seperate thoughts and shit. later

OKAY today was....overly-complicated to say the least. i was supposed to go see harry potter w/ ian. we'd had this planned since like a week before it even came out and we were finally going today and then it ended up he was bringing michael and justin and that i was bringing jill, who was bringing jed. well. lets just say there was a conflict of interests and much drama ensued. it almost got to the point where me and jill were just going to not go all together but then decided not to let this ruin our day. soo....me and jill went with jed and ian showed up w/ michael and justin...ohh dom showed up too and sat with us. while ian, michael and justin sat in like the very front. lol kinda sad, the only two people that were originally supposed to go didnt even sit together. oh well its all good! yeah today was...just i dont know. drama is over-rated. i wasn't even mad or like i dunno the word....affected? by the situation until...justin i think it was decided he was going to boss me around and tell me to shut up and do what he says and all this other bullshit. umm you dont do that. ESPECIALLY when you dont fucking know someone. it still is quite odd to me why Ian didnt say anything to him about talking to me like that but at the same time it doesn't, boys aren't like they used to be. olden days that kid woulda got the shit beat out of him by ian for talking to me like that...nowadays it gets a chuckle. wonderful world we've got now huh. whatever. i'm leaving on monday and my mom decided to go on a power trip and if anyone wants to see me they have to come to me. blahh she loves pissing me off. i swear its her source of entertainment. but whatever anyways!

after the movie was over we left dom stranded cuz he wanted to go to the mall and we were just like umm nope. so we took off and ran over jed's prized sonic blow up bat! sorry jed!!!!!! :'-( god and then he got a call that he was supposed to be at work at 5 (it was 5:45 when we left) so yeah we hauled ass. then jill was supposed to come back here but jesse came into town so shes hangin out with him. its all good i didnt care, im going out of town with her in 2 days and she never gets to see him so i was happy for her <3  but this is entirely too in-depth about my day so im going to go now. and do nothing. 

ps: NO ONE TOLD ME THERE WAS A CLOWN IN THE FUCKING MOVIE! what is wrong with yall!?!?

i better watch out what i write on here...dont wanna write anything i might not have the "right" to say. ha fuck that. how can you go and tell me to stay out of something when pretty much EVERYONE is involved in it already, pretty much gay if you ask me. Its not my fault i was tired of seeing you upset and worrying, shit i guess that makes me a bad friend huh. maybe theres a handbook on what i should do when someone's telling me how awful things are and blah blah blah. i should pick it up, cuz apparently doing something is not the friend thing to do. maybe i should have done nothing, cuz that woulda been a hell of a lot easier on me. cuz we all know my life is one fucking piece of cake all the time. but im not here to complain about me cuz i know lifes not easy and all that so im dealing. but hey i fucked up again whats new? ha  anyways....so, i did what i thought was right, i still think it was right by the way and wont change my mind. but thats not the point. anyways i tried to help and what happened, i got fucked over, by TWO people, one of which isn't part of the situation either just thought i'd call that to your oblivious attention. but whatever, you made me part of the situation and then turned around and told me to stay the fuck out. whatever if your going to tell everyone how you feel BUT the person that actually needs to know go ahead, i promise you it wont solve anything but if it makes you feel better to put away messages up displaying to the world how miserable he is making you feel have at it. i'll sit back and let it happen cuz i dont fucking care anymore. i would say i talked to him because i love you and i dont want to see you upset, but seeing as i dont remember what love is, that feeling must not be what it was that made me do it. hopefully i find out soon what it was cuz im kind of confused at the moment. all i have left to say to you, and you know who you are,

i tried, i really did. but it wasn't good enough for you. so do what you wish, suffer if you like.

i really don't know exactly what just happened. i think i lost a friend. although im not quite sure cuz 10 mins later she told me it was all ok. except i dont know if she really meant it. im still kind of confused...hopefully its all ok now..im not really sure, but i really hope it is. it never ends though, if its not one thing with someone its another thing with someone else. constant worry and all this crazy shit..im gonna die of over-analization and stress. you watch

a message to all of you: never take for granted the ones you love and the fact that you think they'll always be there, you never know when they're feeling like you've left them behind and that you don't love them back. I'm sorry <3

i think i figured out today why its so hard to change. i don't really know how to explain it just yet but..its the fact that no one really likes change, because if someone/something changes it might not be the way they like and definately not the way they're used to. your friends are people you trust to have faith in you, but most of the time they're the ones that make you feel the smallest when it comes to changing. most likely not all of them, or even the majority, it could be just one, but its the one friend you'd think would always bring you up and never down. maybe thats just me, i hope it is. maybe i shouldnt try. just let things come and go...god i wish i didn't care. this is always the greatest way to begin the summer.

but to all of you who are there for me, i love you all more than you know.

jb. ic. kk. kc. jq. you all know i need you to get me through.

well...lets see..lately things have been...interesting...to say the least. i dunno it seems everything about everyone i thought i knew is unraveling right in front of me. i don't know how to stop it, or even where to start the stopping process. (?) so i'm not even going to try, things happen because they're supposed to. If your supposed to lose the people you love you will, theres no holding on to it. we're puppets on a string and our fate holds the end. you never know just where your going to be led next, to a room with great new best friends or smack into a broken heart, or maybe both at the same time so you get completely fucked and you have no idea how you feel anymore. but this is all self inflicted isnt it? who knows. someone please tell me cuz i sure as hell dont. how is it possibly for your heart to be shattered and completely overjoyed at the same time?

also, i learned something about someone today, another lie to add to their list. at the time it really bothered me, not exactly to hear what i heard, but that i heard it from someone that wasnt you and that once again you LIED about whats going on in your life, we're not dating, i know that but you told me we were still "best friends" or some shit& at the time i really wanted to call you and just say "Fuck you" and hang up. but then ian kissed me and i forgot who you were. i hope your happy cuz i know i am.
